parts.text: So how does games detect memory changes if they don't have access to the phone directly

Lol, they don't need access to the *whole* phone, fam. Games just scan *their own* memory space, ya know? Like, they're constantly checking their own pockets for weird stuff.

Anti-cheat be lookin' for sus values or code that ain't s'posed to be there. Basically, they self-monitor ðŸ‘€
So how does games detect memory changes if they don't have access to the phone directly
